property.name: dfs.replication
property.description: Default block replication. The actual number of replications can be specified when the file is created. The default is 3.

property.name: dfs.blocksize
property.description: The default block size for new files, in bytes. You can use the following suffix (case insensitive): k, m, g, t, p, e, or Z to specify the size. The default unit is bytes.
